video.title: Psychic Investigators
video.synopsis: Psychics lend a hand to police departments stumped by difficult crimes in this series that dramatizes real-life cases.

episodes.synopsis: After she accurately describes a college girl's murder, psychic Gale St. John helps police hunt for the killer before he strikes again.
episodes.title: Forced Entry

episodes.synopsis: When a woman disappears after leaving a bar with a stranger, psychic Vicki Monroe tells police the woman is speaking to her from beyond the grave.
episodes.title: Finding Amy

episodes.synopsis: When the search for a missing carpenter in Louisiana comes up short, California psychic Rosemarie Kerr offers the family clues to the man's fate.
episodes.title: Decoy Dolly

episodes.synopsis: When a serial killer murders an elderly woman in Louisiana, Hawaii-based psychic Rose Kopp offers investigators valuable information about the crime.
episodes.title: River Rat

episodes.synopsis: As the hunt for a teenager who was abducted from a grocery store parking lot intensifies, the boy's family turns to psychic Carol Pate for help.
episodes.title: Home After Dark

episodes.synopsis: Years after the case goes cold, a new investigator calls in psychic Noreen Renier to help solve the brutal murder of a state auditor in Montana.
episodes.title: A Taxing Death

episodes.synopsis: Years after an elderly woman is brutally stabbed to death, psychic Phil Jordan gives detectives assistance that could break the cold case wide open.
episodes.title: The Ladykillers

episodes.synopsis: As police close in on their prime suspect in the murder of two prostitutes, psychic Carol Pate claims that they are arresting an innocent man.
episodes.title: The Wrong Man

episodes.synopsis: Unable to catch the vicious attacker who has been assaulting elderly women in a small town, detectives turn to psychic Nancy Myer for help.
episodes.title: Homestead Horror

episodes.synopsis: Cops think a shifty nightclub owner has skipped town, but the man's fiancée fears the worst and turns to psychic Laurie McQuary for help.
episodes.title: Bad Company

episodes.synopsis: When a rapist terrorizes a college town, police turn to psychic Noreen Renier for help catching the man before his crimes become even more heinous.
episodes.title: Staunton Stalker

episodes.synopsis: After years of fruitless investigation, a detective calls in psychic Noreen Renier to help solve the shocking murders of two teenage girls.
episodes.title: Tunnel Vision

episodes.synopsis: When a storm thwarts the search for a boy who disappeared into the woods, psychic Phil Jordan uses the youngster's shoe to continue the hunt.
episodes.title: How Dark the Woods

episodes.synopsis: When a New Jersey man is suspected of beating his girlfriend to death, the victim's sister turns to psychic Nancy Weber to get to the truth.
episodes.title: Vision of Murder

episodes.synopsis: When police reopen a case against a man suspected of brutally killing a family friend, psychic Sharon Johns joins the accused's defense team.
episodes.title: A Psychic for the Defense
